title: TK Counter Discord Bot
description: A discord bot created to help me and my friends count and rank who has team killed the most on FPS games. I came up with the idea for this bot after seeing how editing our tracking was before, which was editing a single pinned post on discord. This bot is written in Python using the discord.py module and stores team kill records for each user in a JSON file. The bot supports both English and Japanese.

title: Mock Course Registration Website
description: A website created with a friend as part of our final project for our web development course. I was tasked with implementing the RESTful API endpoints using Node.JS/Express. I also implemented authentication for requests through usage of JSON Web Tokens.
technologies: Javascript, Node.JS, Express, HTML, CSS, JSON Web Token
